org.optaplanner.core.impl.score.director

Class AbstractScoreDirectorFactory<Solution_>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.optaplanner.core.impl.score.director.AbstractScoreDirectorFactory<Solution_>
  • Type Parameters:
    Solution_ - the solution type, the class with the PlanningSolution annotation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    InnerScoreDirectorFactory<Solution_>, ScoreDirectorFactory<Solution_>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConstraintStreamScoreDirectorFactory, DroolsScoreDirectorFactory, EasyScoreDirectorFactory, IncrementalScoreDirectorFactory

    public abstract class AbstractScoreDirectorFactory<Solution_>
extends Object
implements InnerScoreDirectorFactory<Solution_>
    Abstract superclass for ScoreDirectorFactory.
